settings.newsletter--info:
New arrivals, exclusive discounts and
early access to sales when you join the mailing list

settings.title: BUILD YOUR MOMENTUM
settings.description: Nothing will get in the way of your performance with our new BUILD TANK . Crafted with wide armholes to allow for total motion and its sweat wicking Function to keep you cool.

settings.title: SET THE PACE
settings.description:
With our new PACE  bra , your perfect partner for studio
sessions with it’s low cut yetsupportive design and
strappy back detailing.
